metadata.synopsis: A hostage reacts to the fact that a battle took place (maybe there's bodies around, or just general destruction).
metadata.how_to_trigger: Triggers by the first Gondian hostage to come out of the submersible after the rescue, if the players fought the Waveservants in the basement.All hostages are in the speaker group, so this should cover both male and female, and human, gnome and halfling races.
